edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_prog_assgment

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_prog_assgment.GameBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GameBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This Class contains all the Data for a Save Game. Creating this Object also creates all necessary Entities, and provides a Matrix Representation of the Map. Also Keeps Track of the Turn Count of the active Game
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameBoard

        public GameBoard()

    • Method Detail

      • placeNinja

        protected void placeNinja()
        Places a ninja in a spot on the board, rules for placing are as follows 1. Cannot be placed in a room 2. Cannot be placed on another ninja 3. Cannot be placed within 3 spaces of the player. Ninja place in data ("000") string is 3rd, 1 - true ninja is there(001) 0 - false no ninja there.(000)

      • placeItem

        private void placeItem(Items.ItemType type)
        Places an item in a spot on the board, rules for placing are as follows 1. Cannot be placed on player 2. Cannot be placed in room if not Briefcase 3. If Briefcase MUST be placed in room 4. Cannot be placed in spot with another item Item place in data ("000") string is 2nd, 0 - No item present (000) a - item present is ammo (0a0) i - item present is invincibility (0i0) r - item present is radar (0r0) b - item present is Briefcase (0b0)
        Parameters:
        type - Item Type To Place

      • setFlag

        protected void setFlag(int spot,
                       int flagNumber,
                       char i)
        Takes the board value at spot of three characters and sets the char at flagNumber to i.
        Parameters:
        spot - - spot on board to be changed.
        flagNumber - - which flag to set 1-3
        i - - what to set flag to.

      • checkFlag

        protected boolean checkFlag(int spot,
                            int flagNumber,
                            char i)
        Checks flagNumber at spot on the board to see if it equals i.
        Parameters:
        spot - - spot on board to be checked.
        flagNumber - - which flag to check 1-3
        i - - what to compare the flag to
        Returns:
        true - if flag == i otherwise false

      • inProxPlayer

        private boolean inProxPlayer(int i)
        checks if spot in array is in proximity to the player (within 3 spaces).
        Parameters:
        i - the spot to check
        Returns:
        if Player is in Proximity

      • isRoom

        protected boolean isRoom(int i)
        checks if spot in array is a room.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        if the spot is a room

      • getPlayerLoc

        protected int getPlayerLoc()
        Loops through board array and checks for player position shouldn't ever return -1.
        Returns:
        int of player's location

      • getNinjaLoc

        protected int[] getNinjaLoc(int numberOfNinjas)
        Loops through board array, finds how many ninjas are on the board and places their locations into an appropriately sized array
        Parameters:
        numberOfNinjas - number of ninjas left alive
        Returns:
        int array with all ninja locations
